survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from participants of professional certification programs to improve course content, delivery, and overall experience.

questions.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?
questions.client_notes: Use a dropdown menu for mobile-friendly selection. Include an 'Other' option with text input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Dropdown with single-choice selection and optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which professional certification program did you recently complete?

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall quality of the certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure scale labels are clearly visible.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the overall quality of the certification program?

questions.question_text: Which aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with text input for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox for multi-choice selection with optional text input for 'Other'.

script.question_text: Which aspects of the program did you find most valuable? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future iterations of this certification program?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to capture detailed feedback. Set a generous character limit.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Text area for open-ended responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future iterations of this certification program?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to colleagues or peers?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale identical to Q2 for consistency. Consider adding a Net Promoter Score (NPS) calculation.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Radio buttons for single-choice selection.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend this certification program to colleagues or peers?
